Package org.liquidengine.legui.system.layout

Interface Layout

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlexLayout
    public interface Layout
    Layout interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void layout​(Component parent)
      Used to lay out child components for parent component.
      void layout​(Component parent, Frame frame, Context context)
      Used to lay out child components for parent component.

    • Method Detail

      • layout

        void layout​(Component parent)
        Used to lay out child components for parent component. Do not generate ChangePositionEvent and ChangeSizeEvent events.
        Parameters:
        parent - component to lay out.

      • layout

        void layout​(Component parent,
            Frame frame,
            Context context)
        Used to lay out child components for parent component. Generates ChangePositionEvent and ChangeSizeEvent events.
        Parameters:
        parent - component to lay out.
        frame - component frame (for event generation).
        context - context (used for event generation).
